content: Hey, I was working on the blog, and i found blog posts attributed to the "Const Eval WG", and I noticed that we don't have a const eval team in the rust-lang/team repo? Is that intentional?
how is the wg-const-eval GH team populated then?
maybe not on the team repo, but it exists as a github team: https://github.com/orgs/rust-lang/teams/wg-const-eval

I opened https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/pull/201 to try and rectify this, but I think I scared everyone off by proposing a weekly meeting. I don't think it's intentional. We could re-open that PR and make a new one to rust-lang/team.
@ecstatic-morse If you could that would be great! :slight_smile:
